page.title: 11MY LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content:
I have a lot of leisure activities.I enjoy dancing and I go to a dancing class on a Saturday morning.We do Modern dancing,Ballet and Character dancing mixed in. My dad likes golf and computers. Sometimes in the evening he goes to a golf course and on Saturday he and my brother use the computer most of the time. My mum enjoys flower arranging and reading.She goes to a flower club and a flower arranging college.She often does flower demonstrations as well. My brother goes to an art class every Saturday morning and spends a lot of his time drawing.I also go to Girls' Brigade where my mum is an officer.
By {Helen Horswood}
